title: How do i retrieve my honours back?
body:
Hey i got punished in early season 7 and i was wondering if there was a way to retrieve back my honours. i really want rewards and try my best to achieve them. There have been games where ive gotten 4 honours and made no progress. thanks


{{champion:104}} {{item:2060}}

replies.body:
you stop being toxic and GIT GUD 

{{sticker:sg-poppy}}
I just stated i havent been toxic since i got my punishment which was in early season 7 and ive gotten 4 honours many times so im "good".
Just carry the game, don't be toxic and get honoured or duo so you'll get honoured every game.
